import React from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Dropdown, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Layout: React.FC<{ children: React.ReactNode }> = ({ children }) => { const { user, logout, isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Debug: Log user object to see what's available console.log('ðŸ” Layout - User object:', user); console.log('ðŸ” Layout - User role:', user?.role); console.log('ðŸ” Layout - Is procurement?', user?.role === 'procurement'); const handleLogout = async () => { try { await logout(); navigate('/login'); } catch (error) { console.error('Logout failed:', error); } }; const isActive = (path: string) => location.pathname === path; if (!isAuthenticated) { return <>{children}; } return (
{/* Header */}
Philippine Procurement Solutions
Dashboard {/* Procurement-specific navigation */} {(user?.role === 'procurement' || user?.role === 'procurement0') && ( <> Item Proposal Pending Items Purchase Requests Blockchain Transactions Supplier List )} {/* Admin access to all features */} {user?.is_admin && ( <> Purchase Orders Suppliers Inventory Blockchain )} {/* Validator role - blockchain consensus operations */} {user?.role === 'validator' && ( Blockchain Consensus )} {/* Auditor role - read-only access to reports and blockchain */} {user?.role === 'auditor' && ( <> Blockchain Explorer )} {/* Finance role - financial operations and reports */} {user?.role === 'finance' && ( <> Purchase Orders Financial Records )} {user?.is_admin && ( Users )} {/* Reports dropdown - role-based access */} Reports {/* Procurement role - procurement-focused reports */} {user?.role === 'procurement' && ( <> Item Proposal Reports Pending Items Reports Purchase Request Reports Supplier Reports Blockchain Transaction Reports )} {/* Finance role - financial reports */} {user?.role === 'finance' && ( <> BIR Reports Financial Reports Order Reports )} {/* Auditor role - audit and compliance reports */} {user?.role === 'auditor' && ( <> Audit Trail Compliance Reports Blockchain Reports )} {/* Admin role - all reports */} {user?.is_admin && ( <> Audit Trail BIR Reports Inventory Reports Order Reports System Reports )}
{user?.full_name || 'User'} {user?.is_admin && ( Admin )} {user?.role === 'procurement' && ( Procurement )} {user?.role === 'validator' && ( Validator )} {user?.role === 'auditor' && ( Auditor )} {user?.role === 'finance' && ( Finance )} {user?.role === 'supplier' && ( Supplier )} Profile {user?.is_admin && ( Settings )} {user?.role === 'procurement' && ( Procurement Settings )} Logout
{/* Main Content */}
